titleStmt.title: A sermon preached at St Maries in Oxford on Act Sunday last in the after-noone 1622. By Richard Gardiner student of Christ-Church
titleStmt.author: Gardiner, Richard, 1591-1670.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Iohn Lichfield and Iames Short for William Davis book-seller,

notesStmt.note: Cf. Folger catalogue, which gives signatures: [par.]⁴ A-D⁴ (-D4).
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
